```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}

# Reading in the data

most_recent <- readRDS('ppp_allvars_1028.rds')

# Faceting by race

cut_ppp <- most_recent %>%
  mutate(cuts =  cut(black_percent,
                   seq(0, 100, by = 10))) %>%
  group_by(cuts) %>%
  select(state, cuts, days_to_approval) %>%
  drop_na(state)


```
